name: Z-Day (Strider11)
description:
Welcome to Z-Day 1.0!

An experiment has gone wrong and Zombie’s have been increasing in numbers. Some zombies have even evolved new skills. Due to the failed experiments you are the last human remaining. Get 50 ZombieCoins every time you kill a zombie! The three zombies: normal; Dies in 2 shots. Fast Zombie; Dies in 4 shots and walks much faster. Lastly, Stone Zombie: Dies in 10 shots and is very very slow. Become the best zombie slayer there is. Arrow keys to move, if you hold left shift and move, you sprint. Space bar is to shoot and right shift to open/close the door. To open the door, go to the red button next to it and click right shift. Repeat the process to close it. Hope you enjoy our game!
